title: MY ACCOUNT JUST GOT PERMA BANNED?!?!?!?!..............
body:
-----------HEAR ME OUT PLEASE-----------

Everyone, I need help appealing this perma ban... I don't know how to do it, but it was seriously unfair in my opinion. I never report anyone for swearing at me, and I only swear when people start flaming at me... I always get reported. This is seriously an issue, as my ban is a result of other people becoming angry with me in many games because I am not the best player. I try my hardest to do well, however if I fail I always get abused and flamed, and this causes me to react big time. I have been playing on this account for around 4-5years, and have spent hundreds upon hundreds of dollars on this game, supporting the company whilst simultaneously enjoying myself. I request a serious consideration with this perma ban. I'll happily take a perma mute instead to forever stop me from flaming my team members or the opposition in game (I can still communicate with my team using pings). Please Riot, I'm sorry for what I've said, but its not me. The community of people I play with turn me into someone I am not, and i would be humbled if you could please give me a second chance, or punish me in another form. A permanent ban is not the answer. <3 Pls guys, help a fellow rifter out...

Thanks for your time...
U 7 R I 3 D (formerly, Kazuto Kirigaya)

I don't have time to delve too deep here, and you've gotten some good answers, but I can point you in the direction of some good discussion.

This was a discussion I had with someone who had been punished for the first time, and it clarifies a lot of how the system works, especially with regard to retaliation and provoked behaviour (it's a big read but he asked a lot of good questions): 
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/uoJ6mM2m-chat-restrictions-set-due-to-toxicity

Here is a discussion with Riot on why perma mutes aren't a thing: 
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/99W0Zvji-i-am-speechless-picture-intensive?comment=00040000000100010000

And of course the general FAQ for the Instant feedback system:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-

Hey U 7 R I 3 D,

That's very upsetting that your account has been permanently banned. Let me try to provide some explanation about the severity of the punishment and why it probably won't be lifted. There is a lot of info [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201898070) about account suspensions if you're interested in reading further.


>I only swear when people start flaming at me

Unfortunately for you, this is still punishable. Although it _seems_ justified because you have been provoked, it still negatively impacts the game for the other people on your team and can often create a downward spiral of negativity/breakdown in communications. The support page I linked earlier says that _regardless of circumstance_ (i.e. whether you were provoked or not), swearing, harassment, abuse etc. will likely be reported by other players and punished by the instant feedback system.

>my ban is a result of other people becoming angry with me in many games

This is incorrect. Your ban is a result of your actions in game, not because of other players. If they are being toxic, then they will also face punishment (just report them and move on). However, you cannot blame them for the way you chose to respond to their toxicity. 

Also about this:

>I never report anyone for swearing at me

It's actually a good thing to report another player if you believe their behaviour is unacceptable. That is how toxicity can be reduced in the community, leading to more positive experiences in-game. Just because you choose not to report players does not mean they show you a similar mercy! And of course there's no way to know if another player has reported you or not.

Unless you were VERY toxic, I'm guessing that this is not the first time your account has been restricted. It has probably gone through two lots of chat restrictions and a two-week suspension. These punishments are designed to show you that your behaviour in-game is considered unacceptable by other players, and to serve as a warning that you need to reform your behaviour or lose your account.
Thanks for all the real talk tbh... im not pissed about the account im just mad you lose all the money you've spent on it like that and you can't do anything about  it...

In order to appeal a punishment you need to submit a ticket to support, found here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

As for changing the "perma-ban" punishment to be less severe, that's certainly not needed. Players are given plenty of opportunity to reform by going through the standard punishment tiers and by changing that to be less severe (particularly removing the "perma-ban") you're basically saying that breaking the rules isn't that bad and enabling the toxic players within the game. There's no need for change there.

> as my ban is a result of other people becoming angry with me

No, it's not. Your ban would be the result of *your* behaviours in-game. When push comes to shove, how someone else acts becomes irrelevant when talking about *you*. They will get punished for doing that kind of thing (as long as they get reported) and so will you. "They started it" is a childish excuse and you should not be condoning that mentality.
Another kid crying about a perma ban, nothing new here, move on

It is amazing how this kind of thing changes our mindset not just in game but also in real life.

I am not sure if Riot can unban you, and I hope they do.
But if they cannot, I want you to know that although this sounds like a loss for you,
I believe in reality, you gain more since you can apply what you learn here in real life.
